answer:
Please speak to your new employer about their occupational health program requirements. Learn more about tuberculosis (TB) screening.
In BC, a fee is charged for persons requiring TB skin testing for an educational program, a volunteer position, or for employment. Contact your local health unit to ask where TB skin tests are available in your area. Use the health unit finder.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## Please speak to your new employer about their occupational health program requirements.

Learn more about tuberculosis (TB) screening.
In BC, a fee is charged for persons requiring TB skin testing for an educational program, a volunteer position, or for employment.
Contact your local health unit to ask where TB skin tests are available in your area.

## Use the health unit finder.

Immunization Nurse
question: I had a TBskin test 2years ago for work.I am entering another health care industry.Do I need TBtest again?
question_variation_0: do you need tb test again
question_variation_1: do you need a tb test test again
question_variation_2: tbskin test is needed when entering medical care
